phrases: It is great that you can,
but you will run into something like that.
I was not looking where I was going.
This is Kud, a girl who transferred here this spring.
That is... that is... that is...
I know you can speak Japanese.
You do not have to force yourself to speak English.
I-I know I can, but as you know, I lied a little when I first introduced myself here.
Like how I said I did not know much about Japan because I was living overseas.
My room in the girls' dorm.
But I do not want to trouble you!
They are lighter than I thought.
My grandpa sent them here from Finland.
If you ever need help again, just ask.
Thank you so much for helping!
I was hoping for a task so he would tell us the secret of the world.
The secret of the world, huh?
I wonder what amazing secret he has to tell us.
Who put this bandage on you?
How did my name turn into Inohara-star-Masato?!
So you are the culprit, Sarcastic Maracas?
You come here from some other class to hang out, and now this?!
Masato, were you taking a nap just now?
He was sleeping so peacefully, his face was just begging for me to draw on it!
I have figured out who took care of Fabre's paw.
It certainly looks like something she would use.
Why do not you tell her yourself?
I would not be asking you if I could.
How long are you going to avoid her?
She is part of the Little Busters now, you know?
Give these to her for me as thanks.
Komari-kun went somewhere with a bag of snacks just now.
I wonder what she is dreaming about.
I am sure it is a happy dream.
But why did you headbutt me when I woke up?
I have been embarrassed by Naoe-kun!
No, I did not do anything...
Though, you were talking in your sleep.
Oh, why do not I call you Riki-kun from now on?
You can call me Komari too.
I guess I will go with Komari-san, then.
Riki-kun, do you want some snacks?
Plain scones and the sweetest apricot jam.
Have some with this afternoon tea.
You took care of Fabre's paw, right?
Rin asked me to give these to you as thanks.
I will save these for tomorrow.
I will invite Rin-chan here and eat them with her!
If I can make Rin-chan a little happier by having snacks with her right here, I will be happy too!
If you make someone happy, you will be happy too.
So, Komari-san, you have an older brother?
You really did hear me talking in my sleep!
Do not worry, that is all I heard.
I do not have a brother.
But I always see him in my dreams.
An older brother existing only in my dreams.
He always reads a picture book to me with a warm voice like the sun.
A picture book with eggs and chicks.
The story is a little sad.
I do not remember what the story was about.
I always forget whenever I wake up.
That is why I always feel a little lonely when I wake up.
It was the first time I saw a little loneliness in Komari-san's smile.
A picture book with eggs and chicks?
Komari-san might have actually read one when she was younger.
I think she will be really happy if I can tell her what kind of story it was.
You are joining me on the roof today, Rin.
Komari-san's really looking forward to this.
Do you want to disappoint her?
You are giving off some kind of sad aura.
I went back home yesterday afternoon.
I thought I might find that picture book I used to read.
One day, an egg became a chick.
After taking three steps, the hen forgot that it was once an egg,
One day, that egg became a chick.
The story's back to where it started.
And it just repeats, over and over.
It made me feel really sad.
But the hen remembers again at the end.
You mean you really had a brother?
Maybe you have another relative with that name?
I asked my mom, but she said that there was not anyone with that name.
I know my mom is lying about something.
I think it is something I cannot ask about.
Did he run away from home?
But if he did, why do not I remember anything about him?
Why is he only in my dreams?
He might be somewhere out there.
I think Rin's saying, I hope you can meet him one day.
Do you have any plans on Sunday?
Want To go to a retirement home with me?
I am going to a retirement home with Komari-san.
but Komari-san goes there a lot.
So we cannot play together today?!
You just smashed my plans to have a happy fun time with you!
How could you do this to me, man?!
Does it look like I am having fun
The girls' softball team is using the field.
I thought maybe we could have some fun together.
I was feeling a little too bored, you see.
But so long as it is with two beautiful, young girls,
it would be my pleasure to go to any strange place!
We are going to a retirement home, you know.
What do you want us to do at this retirement home?
We will make a happy, sunny place.
We will talk to the residents and help clean their rooms.
I think a lot of them feel really lonely.
If everyone is really happy and the place is full of smiles, it will be really warm and sunny!
It is my first time doing community service.
Granny, did your cold get better?
I will bring some more next time!
Let us have a nice conversation when you do!
Talking with you is always a delight, Komari-chan!
Komari-kun's idol aura is at full strength!
This is the scarf my dear wife had knit me!
Alright, our job is to go around cleaning the rooms and talking to the residents here!
I cannot think of any shared topics of interest.
When you are feeling down, you say it out loud and follow it with an alright!
See, everything negative gets flipped positive!
Would you like some muscle today?
I will take one order of muscle then.
He just went with the flow...
Komari-san spreads happy, sunny places wherever she goes.
Is Komari-san's brother still around somewhere?
I did not want to think about that possibility.
I do not ever want to see Komari-san sad.
What the hell do you want?!
This room does not need any cleaning!
There is stuff all over the floor!
That is none of your business!
Do you have to scream so much?!
I may be thin and withered, but I am not so senile as to ask something of a kid!
I am doing it whether you ask me or not.
I am telling you I do not need your help.
But it feels better to have a clean room, does not it, gramps?
I am not gramps, I am Kojiro!
In that case, Kojiro-san, I will feel better when your room is clean.
What is with that self-centered way of thinking?
I am borrowing one of my friends' theories.
Not nearly as weird as you, Kojiro-san.
Flip over the tatami and what do you find?
I think that feels a lot better.
It will be back to the way it was soon enough.
Come back to clean again sometime, kid.
Did you just come out of that room?
I have come here so many times, but I have never been able to meet the grandpa in that room.
I simply put what you told me into action.
What did Komari-san ever do to you?
Do not let her come near me.
I said, do not let her come near me again.
Hey, Riki-kun, let us go see the stars!
We are going to the rooftop at night...
We will Make a Happy, Sunny Place
We will Make a Happy, Sunny Place
We will Make a Happy, Sunny Place
hitori ga tsurai kara futatsu no te wo tsunaida
It was too hard for one to do, so two of us held hands
hitori ga tsurai kara futatsu no te wo tsunaida
It was too hard for one to do, so two of us held hands
futari ja samishii kara wa ni natte te wo tsunaida
But two would be too lonely, so we all came together in a circle and held hands
futari ja samishii kara wa ni natte te wo tsunaida
But two would be too lonely, so we all came together in a circle and held hands
kitto sore ga ikusen no chikara ni mo nari
I am sure that will be strength in itself,
kitto sore ga ikusen no chikara ni mo nari
I am sure that will be strength in itself,
donna yume mo tateru ki ga surunda
Enough to end any dream we have
donna yume mo tateru ki ga surunda
Enough to end any dream we have
Fly high, high into the sky,
Fly high, high into the sky,
takaku kere takaku koe wo age
Jump high, and raise your voice high,
takaku kere takaku koe wo age
Jump high, and raise your voice high,
itsuka kujiketa sono hi no mukou made
Until you can move on past the day we will have died
itsuka kujiketa sono hi no mukou made
Until you can move on past the day we will have died
kimi no koe wasurenai namida mo wasurenai
I will never forget your voice, and I will never forget your tears
kimi no koe wasurenai namida mo wasurenai
I will never forget your voice, and I will never forget your tears
kore kara hajimaru kibou to iu na no mirai wo
The future, what we call hope, begins now
kore kara hajimaru kibou to iu na no mirai wo
The future, what we call hope, begins now
Those legs will keep on moving forward,
Those legs will keep on moving forward,
Even in the face of the oncoming grief
Even in the face of the oncoming grief
The sound of the bell echoing,
The sound of the bell echoing,
Those pieces we shared, one each
Those pieces we shared, one each
I hope tomorrow will be sunny
I hope tomorrow will be sunny
Can we go beyond the stars?
Can we go beyond the stars?
Walking, looking at the sky, a single light
Walking, looking at the sky, a single light
Even alone, on the face of the moon,
Even alone, on the face of the moon,
rasen no hate he kaketeyuku yo
Run right past the end of the circle
rasen no hate he kaketeyuku yo
Run right past the end of the circle
You will be able to smile after you cry,
You will be able to smile after you cry,
I said that because I know you can
I said that because I know you can
bokura no tabi wasuretari shinai yo
You will never forget our journey, even for a moment
bokura no tabi wasuretari shinai yo
You will never forget our journey, even for a moment
I will cast a little magic so you never lose it,
I will cast a little magic so you never lose it,
And I will not say good-bye
And I will not say good-bye
You will start walking again one day
You will start walking again one day
